A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw it and I wish I hadn't. It had a very poor story according to me. What is truly amazing is the insanely high critic score. This doesn't make sense to me. I am aware that people are very split  as about 50% actually love it and 50% really hate it. Unfortunately\, this star wars is not for me\, I feel that the original characters were destroyed and the new story feels meaningless and full of plot holes. A very big shame :(
